vuePress-theme-reco joenix    2020

Getting Started

joenix

# Getting Started

COMPATIBILITY NOTE

  • Vue-Scaff requires Node.js >= 10
  • It is currently recommended to use Yarn instead of npm

# Basic Support

# basic support
yarn global add @vue/cli

# Creation

# create a application
vue create -p vue-scaff/vue-cli-preset --clone <project-name>

# Simply Use

# start coding
yarn serve

# build project
yarn build

# Environment

# Launch Serve with `--mode=development`
yarn serve --mode=development

# Build App with `--mode=production`
yarn build --mode=production
